title: Larnaca Colourful City Stay Minutes from Finikoudes Beach
description: Colourful and contemporary, the vibrant Hotel Indigo Larnaca, an IHG Hotel, fuses heritage housing with modern luxuries and design. Wake in a stylish guest room and enjoy a satisfying breakfast before a day of lounging by the rooftop pool or having some fun in the sun on the sands of the nearby Finikoudes Beach. As night falls, enjoy a sophisticated cocktail at the Kampana rooftop pool bar, a mellow merlot at the Oinotelia wine bar or hit the streets to discover Larnaca's dynamic nightlife.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Larnaca, an IHG Hotel
